name: Enigma in the Wine Cellar
description:
Enigma in the Wine Cellar 

While visiting your grandparent's country mansion nestled close to a small mountain, you discover a dark passage leading from an unused part of the wine cellar.  Being an adventurous person, you enter this passage to begin exploring.  Climb ladders, swing from handholds, and wade through water while searching for hidden items.  Beware of dead-end pits and confusion traps that turn or move you unexpectedly.

This exploration puzzle game is based on the original Palm OS version.  The custom game engine was written in Java using Android Studio 2.3 IDE running on Lubuntu 16.10.  The 3D image meshes were created with Blender 2.76b, and exported as Stanford PLY 1.0 files.  The sound effects were created using Audacity 2.1.2, and the icons were drawn with mtPaint 3.40.

LINUX Version (5.0)
Released: November 24, 2016.

ANDROID Version (5.1)
Released: January 2, 2018.
